The Phillips Club offers studios, one, and two-bedroom suites with kitchens, catering to both short and long-term stays. The staff is known for providing top-notch service and can arrange various services like car service, in-room massage, and show tickets.

The Plaza Athenee is a smaller, intimate hotel with an almost residential feel, located on a quiet, tree-lined street on the Upper East Side, close to Central Park and Madison Avenue. Staff are attentive, courteous, and focused on the well-being of guests.

The hotel is centrally located near Penn Station, Times Square, and the Empire State Building, with subway access and airport transportation options; the doormen are friendly and helpful. Some reviewers mention feeling safe and well-assisted by staff.

The hotel is in a safe, quiet, residential neighborhood with good access to public transportation, and offers free amenities such as internet and breakfast. The hotel also has a helpful staff who can provide directions and arrange transportation.

The Red Roof Inn Manhattan is conveniently located near Penn Station and subway lines, making it easy to get around, and many reviewers mention feeling safe in the area, even late at night, due to the bustling atmosphere of Korea Town. Some reviewers note the small room size, but that it is equipped with essential amenities like free WiFi, and a helpful concierge.
The hotel is in a great midtown location near shops, Central Park, and subway stations. Concierge and door staff are helpful, and the hotel has a restaurant, bar, and new lounge.

The Renaissance New York Times Square provides a secure environment with warm downlights near the entrance and friendly, helpful staff. Some reviewers noted feeling safe and comfortable alone at this centrally-located hotel, with easy access to transportation and attractions.

The hotel has a security presence and staff is helpful, with a concierge desk available for advice and recommendations; there are also 3 computers in the 3rd-floor lounge, all of which have printing capabilities. It is conveniently located near transportation and many attractions, and has blackout curtains, soundproofing, and in-room safes.

The Ritz-Carlton Battery Park offers a quiet location away from midtown with large rooms and comfortable beds, with easy access to the subway. The hotel staff is known for being helpful and attentive.

The Rockefeller Center Hotel offers easy check-in/check-out via computer kiosks and keycard elevator access for security, with staff noted to be helpful and efficient. It also has free filtered water and internet access available.
The Roger Smith Hotel has a friendly and helpful staff, a lively bar and restaurant, and offers free internet and local calls. The hotel aims to make guests feel welcomed, comfortable, and at home.
The Roger Williams Hotel has friendly and helpful staff, and keycard access to the elevator. Also, the hotel is in a safe area that is not too busy, but close enough to everything.

Room Mate Grace is a smaller European style hotel that has a popular bar, nightly DJs, and pool parties; the staff is friendly, and the hotel has clean, well-organized rooms, free wifi, and a convenient Times Square location. Solo travelers can enjoy the pool bar and Brazillian night, and there is a 24-hour kiosk for drinks and snacks.
The Royalton is known for its attentive staff, who sometimes address guests by name, creating a personal touch. Concierges are available to provide recommendations.

The Salisbury Hotel has friendly and helpful staff, is located near subway stations, and offers easy access to many restaurants and diners. It is described as a good, clean, safe spot to stay, and is in an area that feels safer late at night.

The San Carlos Hotel is known for its friendly and helpful staff, convenient location near attractions and subway lines, and clean, spacious rooms with amenities like microwaves and refrigerators. It also has a business center with free internet and printing, and is located in a safe neighborhood.

Seafarers International House is a budget-friendly option in Manhattan, located near Union Square and major subway lines. It offers clean, basic rooms, some with private bathrooms, and provides amenities like free internet, laundry facilities, and luggage storage.
The Sheraton New York Hotel & Towers is in a central location close to subway lines and transportation. The hotel is also busy, which may appeal to solo travelers.

The hotel is in a quiet location, a reasonable distance from New York, and has a bell captain that is especially helpful finding taxis when needed. The hotel is also within easy walking distance of Time Square and all the shops.
The hotel is conveniently located near the subway, making it easy to travel around Manhattan, and the staff is helpful and friendly. Some reviewers appreciated the quietness and calming atmosphere.

The Sofitel New York is praised for its helpful and friendly staff, with many reviews highlighting the concierge service. Features like clean, quiet, and well-equipped rooms, a gym, and a central location near attractions and transportation options can contribute to a stress-free stay.

The Soho Grand Hotel has friendly staff, a business center, and is well-located near shops and restaurants in the Soho area, with the subway nearby for convenient access to the rest of the city. As a grand guest, travelers can get free beverages and snacks, and the hotel has a business center for work needs.

The hotel has helpful front desk staff who are always happy to chat and book things, and the concierge has more clout than a standard hotel concierge. There are always taxis parked outside and there is free wi-fi everywhere.

The Stay Hotel is located near Times Square and many subway lines, but only has two small elevators which can be slow. The rooms are small and can be noisy, but the hotel offers a business center with free internet.

The Alex Hotel has a friendly staff, offers suites with full kitchens, and is centrally located near Grand Central Station, making it easy to access various parts of Manhattan. The hotel also has amenities like a business center and a gym.

The Belvedere Hotel is centrally located, near Times Square, subway stations, and attractions, with generally friendly and helpful staff and doormen. The hotel offers clean rooms and amenities like a gift shop and luggage storage.

The Benjamin is located near the subway and various activities; the staff is very helpful, remembers names, and aims to meet needs immediately. Each room comes equipped with business amenities like a fax machine, workspace, and a pillow menu to provide comfort.
The Blakely is a smaller boutique hotel with an attentive staff, offering a "home away from home" atmosphere, and is centrally located. Rooms include kitchenettes and comfortable beds.

The Bowery Hotel provides a safe atmosphere for solo travelers, with its convenient location to many neighborhoods, well-stocked minibars including essentials, and friendly staff that are helpful and attentive. The hotel also uses a classic key system where guests can drop off keys at the front desk.

The Bryant Park Hotel offers a central Manhattan location near transportation and Bryant Park, with staff noted to be helpful, courteous, and attentive to detail, ensuring a safe and comfortable stay. Rooms are spacious, well-equipped, and cleaned regularly, with amenities like sound machines and blackout options, though solo travelers may find limited communal areas.

The hotel offers clean, comfortable and quiet rooms, and is centrally located with easy access to subway lines; it's near Grand Central, Empire State Building and delis. Some reviewers noted the staff was courteous, and the concierge was helpful with directions.

The Carlyle has a personal, caring staff composed of career hotel professionals who aim to make your stay pleasant, and offer prompt service. They also offer discrete service, catering to celebrities who want to be left alone.

The Franklin Hotel offers a comfortable and clean stay with a friendly and helpful staff, complimentary breakfast, a 24/7 coffee and tea bar, and evening wine and cheese. Its Upper East Side location is near the subway, Central Park, and museums, although rooms tend to be small.

The French Quarters Guest Apartments is a small, friendly hotel with a warm and welcoming atmosphere, located close to Times Square and subways. The staff is helpful and accommodating, offering personalized service, remembering guests' names, and providing information and directions.

The Gem Hotel Chelsea has small, clean, modern rooms with comfortable beds, good showers, and amenities like free Wi-Fi, bottled water, and coffee makers. The hotel's location in Chelsea is convenient to public transportation, restaurants, and attractions, with friendly and helpful staff.

The hotel is located a few blocks from Penn Station, but some reviewers mention that the surrounding streets can feel unsafe to walk alone at night. Some guests also mentioned the staff was helpful in giving directions and advice.

The Gem Hotel SoHo is located near multiple subway lines and downtown neighborhoods, including the Lower East Side, Little Italy, and Chinatown, with a Whole Foods across the street. The staff is friendly and helpful, offering recommendations and directions, and the hotel provides amenities like free Wi-Fi, coffee, and the option to have food delivered.

The Grant Hotel is a budget-friendly option near the subway, with small rooms and shared bathrooms; some rooms have been renovated. It is located in a safe neighborhood with nearby grocery stores and restaurants.
The Hampton Inn Times Square North has helpful staff, great location, and key-secured elevators, and the front desk is staffed 24/7. Guests also appreciate the safety of the location.

The Helmsley Carlton House is located on the upper east side of Manhattan, one block from Central Park, and offers spacious rooms, including suites with kitchenettes. The hotel has elevator operators and has contracted a minibus service for guests.

The Helmsley Park Lane is favorably located near Central Park, subway stations, and various attractions like Times Square and 5th Avenue, with some rooms offering views of Central Park and the city. The hotel provides services such as helpful concierge, responsive reception, room service, and easy access to transportation.
The Herald Square Hotel has lockers available for luggage storage and offers a free coffee/tea machine in the lobby. Some reviewers mention feeling safe at the hotel and that the staff is helpful.

Hotel 91 is located in the heart of Chinatown, close to the subway and within walking distance of Little Italy, with staff that are helpful in providing directions. The hotel has a 24/7 lounge with complimentary tea and coffee, and a night clerk that can help with the thermostat.

The Hotel at Times Square is in a safe tourist area with easy access to Times Square, Rockefeller Center, and 5th Avenue shopping. The hotel has a helpful staff, iPod docking stations, and free computers, and the rooms have two locks and are quiet.
The Inn at Irving Place is located in a quiet area of Manhattan and has attentive staff. Some reviewers describe it as feeling like a home rather than a hotel.

The Iroquois is a smaller, intimate hotel with a friendly staff that offers personal service and remembers guests by name, with a library for internet access. The hotel is described as having a great location and is a good value, offers free wi-fi, and provides a cozy atmosphere.

The Jane Hotel offers small, cabin-like rooms with shared bathrooms, suitable for solo travelers looking for a clean and safe place to stay in a convenient West Village location near subway and bus lines. It provides amenities like free WiFi, flatscreen TVs, and helpful staff, with some long-term residents adding to the hotel's unique atmosphere.

The Kimberly is known for its friendly staff, with reports of employees remembering guests' names, providing excellent service, and creating a welcoming atmosphere. The hotel offers spacious suites, including options with kitchens, which can make guests feel more at home.

The Lombardy is a small, quiet boutique hotel with spacious studio or one-bedroom apartments, each individually decorated and equipped with a kitchen. It is centrally located on 56th St, near restaurants, shops, and the subway, making it easy to access various parts of Manhattan.

The London NYC's rooms have soundproofing and blackout curtains, is near Times Square and Central Park, and offers a free car service to locations between 34th and 74th streets. The rooms also have iPod docking stations and free WiFi.

The Lucerne is known for its helpful and attentive staff, convenient access to transportation (subway and buses), and a safe, quiet Upper West Side location. Past guests appreciated the hotel for being clean, comfortable, and providing great value.

The Manhattan Club is centrally located near Times Square, Central Park, and subway entrances, making it easy to get around Manhattan. The hotel offers spacious one-bedroom suites with kitchenettes, providing convenience for meals and leftovers.

The Mansfield Hotel is a small, clean boutique hotel with a central location, praised for its helpful staff and complimentary amenities like coffee, tea, and breakfast. Many reviews mention the hotel's comfortable common areas, including a library/lounge and bar.
The Marcel is a small, modern hotel with a friendly and helpful staff, making it a good option for solo travelers. There is also a business lounge and rooftop terrace where guests can relax.

The Maritime Hotel has small, well-designed rooms with comfortable beds and high-quality toiletries, and offers free wifi and a business center. It's located in Chelsea, near subway stations and attractions, with a helpful staff and several restaurants, making it convenient for solo travelers.

The Mark offers services such as on-call doctors, car service, and concierge assistance for booking reservations and show tickets. Some reviewers highlight the helpfulness and attentiveness of the staff.

The Marmara Manhattan offers apartment-style rooms with full kitchens, providing a home-like environment with amenities like free Wi-Fi and helpful staff and is located in a residential area on the Upper East Side, near subway stations for easy access to the city. Some reviewers noted feeling like a "native New Yorker" due to the location and apartment-style accommodations.
The Mave hotel is centrally located in Manhattan with easy access to subway lines and various attractions. The staff is known to be friendly, helpful, and provide personalized recommendations.

The Mercer has a friendly and helpful staff, with a comfortable lobby area where only hotel residents can eat or drink, creating a tranquil environment. The hotel also offers assistance with restaurant reservations and directions, as well as providing amenities such as complimentary passes to a nearby gym.
The Michelangelo Hotel is a smaller, luxury boutique hotel that is well-located, clean, and offers a calm respite from the city. The staff is helpful and friendly, and they remember guests by name.

The Milburn Hotel on the Upper West Side offers a safe neighborhood, proximity to subway stops, and a helpful staff, creating a comfortable environment for independent travelers. Additionally, there are small kitchenettes in the rooms.
The Muse Hotel is a smaller, more intimate boutique hotel located close to Times Square, with clean and modern rooms. The hotel staff is friendly and aims to provide outstanding customer service.

The Helmsley is in a great central location, near Grand Central Station with many major attractions within walking distance. The hotel is very clean and has helpful staff, providing a safe and secure environment for solo travelers.

The New Yorker Hotel is located near Penn Station, has friendly staff, and provides clear directions; there is 24/7 security and it is easy to get to the subway. There are multiple facilities within the hotel, including a diner, restaurant, gift shop, gym, and business center.

The Pierre is known for its professional and attentive staff, elevator operators, and white glove service. The hotel provides a courtesy car and is located in a safe area with staffed elevators and high floors that have few rooms and no long corridors.
The hotel offers butler service, a concierge, and a car service that will take guests within 25 blocks of the Plaza. The staff is attentive and can assist with transportation needs.

The Pod Hotel offers a convenient location near subway lines and major attractions, with small but well-designed rooms including amenities like a sink and iPod docking station. It is often praised as clean and safe, particularly for solo travelers, and has a friendly and helpful staff.

The Premier is a boutique hotel within the Millenium Broadway that offers concierge service, free breakfast, and a complimentary evening reception. Rooms are modern, comfortable, and well-laid out with amenities like flat-screen TVs.

The Ritz Carlton Central Park has impeccable service and staff that know your name and are helpful with any requests, making it a great location for shopping and close to the subway. The hotel also has a concierge and complimentary Bentley for transportation.

The Roosevelt Hotel is conveniently located near Grand Central Station, providing easy access to transportation and making it a safe and friendly option for solo female travelers. The hotel offers services such as luggage storage and helpful staff, making it a manageable experience for those traveling alone.

The Sherry-Netherland has a small, intimate atmosphere with staff that greet guests by name and provide highly personal service. It is primarily a residential building with individually owned and decorated rooms, offering a "luxury apartment" feel with amenities like fresh flowers, chocolates, and complimentary beverages.

The Shoreham Hotel is located in midtown Manhattan, close to many attractions and subway stations, and offers amenities such as free internet access, a gym, and a 24-hour cappuccino/espresso machine, and generally helpful front desk staff. Some reviewers found the hotel provided a safe, convenient and comfortable experience, with small but stylish rooms.

The St. Regis provides butler service, which includes complimentary coffee/tea, garment pressing, and shoe shining. The hotel has a central location near shopping and Central Park with staff that anticipate your needs.

The hotel has compact but functional rooms with comfortable beds, as well as a sexy, chic, and trendy style. It is located in the Meatpacking District close to shops, restaurants, and transportation, and provides nice views of the Hudson.

The Surrey is located on the Upper East Side in a relatively quiet neighborhood, with friendly and helpful staff and doormen who assist with groceries and cabs. It has spacious suites with kitchenettes and is close to Central Park, museums, and grocery stores.

The Sylvan Guest House is located in Harlem, near a grocery store and multiple subway lines, including an express train to Manhattan. Some reviewers mention feeling safe and comfortable in the neighborhood, and the guesthouse itself is described as clean and comfortable, making it feel like home.

The Time Hotel is in a great location with Times Square literally around the corner; door staff are helpful, and guests have felt safe entering and leaving the hotel alone at night. The rooms are modern, clean, and well-equipped, though some guests found them small.
The doormen are helpful in hailing cabs, the concierge is knowledgeable, and the hotel provides luggage assistance. The hotel is centrally located and offers easy access to transportation.

The Westin Times Square is praised for being safe and well-located, as well as having upscale amenities; some reviews noted that the location is convenient for solo travelers who want to be close to Times Square and Broadway. Reviews also highlighted that the hotel is located near many transportation options, making it easy to get around the city.

The Thirty Thirty Hotel offers a convenient midtown Manhattan location near the subway, Grand Central Station, and the Empire State Building. Some reviewers note the hotel's small rooms and friendly staff.

The Thompson LES is in a convenient location near subway lines and within walking distance of multiple neighborhoods like SOHO, Chinatown, and the East Village. Staff are generally helpful, with doormen who can assist with transportation.

The Travel Inn is located in Manhattan on 42nd street, close to Times Square and public transportation, and offers clean rooms. The hotel has security measures such as a garage, a security guard, and a location across from a police station.

The Tribeca Grand is known for its friendly and helpful staff, convenient location near subway lines, and overall excellent service. It is near popular destinations such as SoHo, Chinatown, and Little Italy.

The Trump International Hotel is known for its impeccable service, with staff often anticipating needs and offering personalized attention. The hotel provides amenities such as complimentary drinks upon arrival, free local calls, and personalized stationery.

The Tudor Hotel is located in a quiet area of the city, a few blocks from Grand Central station, with easy access to subways and buses; the rooms have amenities such as in-room safe, coffee maker, iron, and trouser press and some reviewers mention the staff being helpful. The hotel is located near the UN, close to the East River and requires either a cab or a bus trip to Grand Central to access the subway.

The Vincci Avalon has been recommended for solo travelers due to its central location, proximity to subway stations (making it easy to access all parts of Manhattan), and its reputation for safety in the neighborhood. Amenities like in-room safes, helpful bellhops, and free internet in the lobby may be useful for solo travelers.

The W New York - The Court is located in midtown Manhattan, close to Grand Central Station and transportation, making it easy to get around the city; the staff is friendly and can provide assistance. The hotel provides car service and a concierge to help with guest needs.

The W Tuscany is near Midtown Tunnel, Grand Central Station, and various subway lines, which makes getting in, out, and around town effortless. Check-in/out is fast and friendly, and the hotel offers a free Acura car service within Manhattan.

The W Times Square is a cool, modern hotel with attentive staff who greet guests as individuals and try to accommodate requests; it is also work-friendly, offering plenty of outlets and workspace. As a solo traveler, one reviewer reported consistently positive experiences at this hotel.

The W Union Square is in a central location with many nearby shops and subway access, and a smaller, more intimate atmosphere than larger chain hotels. The staff is friendly and accommodating, and the hotel can arrange anything, with convenient services like quick room service, concierge, and bellhops.

The Waldorf Towers offers a private entrance and check-in for a more exclusive experience, with staff known to be attentive and helpful. Suites are spacious, providing a comfortable and quiet retreat from the busy city.
The Wall Street Inn is described as a small, quiet, and clean hotel in the Financial District. It is located near subway stations, making it convenient to access other parts of the city.

The Warwick is a historic hotel centrally located near many attractions and public transportation, and some reviewers felt safe and secure as a single female traveler. The hotel offers amenities like a bar, good restaurant and helpful staff.

The hotel is in a great location with easy access to Times Square, the subway, and many restaurants, and the staff is friendly and helpful. Some rooms are small, but clean and well-equipped with comfortable beds, a safe, and helpful staff.

The Washington Square Hotel is in Greenwich Village near a subway station with friendly staff and is located in a safe neighborhood with a security guard in the lobby. Rooms include a safe and the staff can help with booking tours.

The Wellington Hotel is in a central location with a subway station outside, and offers friendly staff, along with safety deposit boxes. While some rooms are small and noisy, the hotel provides a convenient base with helpful services like arranging transportation.

The hotel staff learns guests' names and helps with tasks such as hailing a taxi and making reservations. The hotel offers room service with large portions and an owner's lounge for coffee and snacks.

The Wingate offers a convenient location near Penn Station and multiple subway lines, making it easy to get around Manhattan. The hotel is also praised for its friendly staff and included amenities such as free Wi-Fi and breakfast.

The Wolcott Hotel is in a central location with friendly staff, and rooms include a safe; lockers are available for storing luggage and the hotel offers an airport booking-in computer. The location is near many attractions and subway stations, and the hotel provides coffee and muffins in the morning.
Woogo Central Park provides 24/7 security and a doorman, but no overall service. Note that the front desk is only staffed from 8 am-10 pm.

The Wyndham Garden Hotel has a friendly and helpful staff, as well as free internet and workspace in the lobby, which could make traveling alone easier. Additionally, the hotel is located close to Penn Station, making transportation convenient.
